EmailTemplate.subject: How MetroStar Continuously Optimizes Their AWS Environment with Turbonomic
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
Using Turbonomic, MetroStar Systems rapidly reduced their monthly AWS spend by 25% and simultaneously improved their environment in the background. Additionally, when the team needed to quickly analyze potential migrations, Turbonomic removed time, uncertainty, and risk out of the equation.
<[[https://resources.turbonomic.com/videos/metrostar-success-story]]>
"It saves us thousands of dollars in the cloud every month and saves us hundreds of hours of labor a year across our entire estate" - John Belcher, Principal Infrastructure Engineer, MetroStar Systems
Schedule a demo <[[https://turbonomic.com/request-a-demo/]]> and learn how Turbonomic can help your IT organization optimize for performance, compliance, and cost in real-time.
Regards, Team Turbonomic
